mapper.insert: insert into messages (ID, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_IDS, URL, MSG_FROM, VALIDITY, CREATEDATE, MSG_EXPIRE, READ_USER_IDS, ICONS) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{msgExpire,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readUserIds,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{icons,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update messages set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_IDS = #{userIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSG_FROM = #{msgFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALIDITY = #{validity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, MSG_EXPIRE = #{msgExpire,jdbcType=INTEGER}, READ_USER_IDS = #{readUserIds,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ICONS = #{icons,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_IDS, URL, MSG_FROM, VALIDITY, CREATEDATE, MSG_EXPIRE, READ_USER_IDS, ICONS from messages where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select ID, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_IDS, URL, MSG_FROM, VALIDITY, CREATEDATE, MSG_EXPIRE, READ_USER_IDS, ICONS from messages
